Uses of BufferRequest in org.apache.hadoop.mapred.buffer.net
 

Subclasses of BufferRequest in org.apache.hadoop.mapred.buffer.net
 class MapBufferRequest
          Tasks that take the output of a map task as their input will request that output via this class.
 class ReduceBufferRequest
          Tasks interested in taking the output of a reduce task as their input do so via this request type.
